name: Blind Man's Room
description:
As a blind man in prison, freedom is in the mind.
But your mind is haunted by Nightmares.
Find the key.
Escape yourself.

W, A, S, D to move
Move button + Left Mouse Click to attack
Left Mouse Click and Mouse Aim to Shoot Guns
Right Click to interact
Sleep in a Bed to recharge your Health and Energy

Energy goes down when you walk or attack. Sleep often.

Starting skills: PHYSICAL - BRAINS - LOCKPICKING - REFORM
